org.cleverbus.api.route
Interface WebServiceUriBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpringWsUriBuilder, TestWsUriBuilder
public interface WebServiceUriBuilder

Contract for creating web service URI.

Author:
Petr Juza

Method Summary
 String getInWsUri(QName qName, String endpointMappingRef, String params)
          Gets "from" URI for handling incoming WS messages with default "endpointMapping" bean.
 String getOutWsSoap12Uri(String connectionUri, String messageSenderRef, String soapAction)
          Constructs a "to" URI for sending WS messages to external systems, i.e., Camel Web Service Endpoint URI for contacting an external system via SOAP 1.2.
 String getOutWsUri(String connectionUri, String messageSenderRef, String soapAction)
          Constructs a "to" URI for sending WS messages to external systems, i.e., Camel Web Service Endpoint URI for contacting an external system via SOAP 1.1.
 

Method Detail

getOutWsUri

String getOutWsUri(String connectionUri,
                   String messageSenderRef,
                   @Nullable
                   String soapAction)
Constructs a "to" URI for sending WS messages to external systems, i.e., Camel Web Service Endpoint URI for contacting an external system via SOAP 1.1.

Parameters:
connectionUri - the URI to connect to the external system, e.g.: http://localhost:8080/vfmock/ws/mm7
messageSenderRef - the message sender ref (bean id/name in Spring context)
soapAction - the SOAP action to be invoked, can be null for implicit handling of SOAP messages by the external system
Returns:
the Camel Endpoint URI for producing (sending via To) SOAP messages to external system

getOutWsSoap12Uri

String getOutWsSoap12Uri(String connectionUri,
                         String messageSenderRef,
                         @Nullable
                         String soapAction)
Constructs a "to" URI for sending WS messages to external systems, i.e., Camel Web Service Endpoint URI for contacting an external system via SOAP 1.2.

Parameters:
connectionUri - the URI to connect to the external system, e.g.: http://localhost:8080/vfmock/ws/mm7
messageSenderRef - the message sender ref (bean id/name in Spring context)
soapAction - the SOAP action to be invoked, can be null for implicit handling of SOAP messages by the external system
Returns:
the Camel Endpoint URI for producing (sending via To) SOAP messages to external system

getInWsUri

String getInWsUri(QName qName,
                  String endpointMappingRef,
                  @Nullable
                  String params)
Gets "from" URI for handling incoming WS messages with default "endpointMapping" bean.

Parameters:
qName - the operation QName (namespace + local part)
endpointMappingRef - the endpoint mapping ref (bean id/name in Spring context)
params - the endpoint URI parameters
Returns:
from URI
